parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the widgets inside the window should have the same dimensions.
TRUE if the widgets inside the window should be stacked vertically.

detaileddescription.para: Set the menu for a window.
Return the id of a menuitem specified to a keystroke.

simplesect.para: The id of the menuitem bound to the keystroke, orNULL .

detaileddescription.para: Maximize a window, either horizontally or vertically, or both.

parameterdescription.para: The maximization state of the window.

detaileddescription.para: Get the maximization state of a window.

simplesect.para: The maximization state of the window.
